```{r}

library(tidyverse) # version 1.3.2

library(mapproj) # version 1.2.11
```

```{r}

kotuku <- get_inat_obs(taxon_name ="Platalea regia", place_id = 6803, geo = TRUE, maxresults = 10000)
```

